title: MIUI 6 beta
description:
Hi people

All the Xiaomi fans, the long awaited MIUI 6 is here.

TO INSTALL:

1.Download the ROM
2.Place it in folder "downloaded_rom" in your SD.
3.goto the updater app on the Mi3
4.choose "select update pakage" from the menu of the updater.
5.browse to the ROM folder and select it.
6.after the update is done,Reboot.
7.have fun and leave a comment.

PS: fully tested it personally. loving it.
